Technical Documentation Page

Welcome to Bootparts Technical Documentation Page template. It was designed to simplify the process of writing technical documentation. The content uses unstyled HTML tags with a straightforward structure.

This template is designed to be readable.

We don't like messy documentation pages. That's why this one is a simple two column page that is mobile friendly.

It is also desgined to be easy to use.

Good documentation is not only about the content. How you structure the content also matters. That's why this template has a very simple structure.

No header. No footer. No hassle.

Put everything on the left side column. Keep it simple.
